Job Title: Product Marketing Associate

Location: Schaumburg, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Customer Service, Sales

Description:
Be Marketable is a privately owned outsourced marketing, sales, and promotions firm based in Lombard. We are looking for innovative, team-oriented individuals who enjoy working with others and maintaining relationships with our prestigious clientele.
Product Marketing Associates will work closely with other team members to support promotional activities and utilize your marketing expertise to help develop and execute brand awareness programs that will increase demand and drive revenue.
This position is full-time and involves responsibilities in:Represent the brand through retail marketing campaigns to increase product awareness and sales and profits.Interact with retail consumers and provide quality customer service.Act as a point person for all consumer relations.Generate leads and drive SALES.Attend retail events to market products.Develop an understanding of the product line and value chain.
Benefits & Our Culture:The management & marketing team offers an environment where our employee's ideas are not only heard but implemented. We offer a team-based and structured environment, however, employees are expected to be self-disciplined in managing their own time and work schedule.Fun, team-building environmentTravel OpportunitiesLeadership workshops & developmentFinancial management, business management, time managementPhilanthropy events -- a chance to give back to the communityRecognition for top performersAdvancement in management based on performancePay of $40-50K yearly based on performance incentives

Job Requirements:The position at our company is an entry-level position so no direct experience is necessary. We believe that hard work, a student mentality, and exceptional communication skills are all that someone needs to be successful in our firm. Training will be provided in multiple aspects of our company including; leadership, marketing, customer service, and management.
For immediate consideration, apply with a copy of your resume.
We are an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or any other protected status. We are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace where all individuals are valued and respected.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
